title: Terms may be changed at any time, but they will notify you in advance

tosdr.tldr: This service may change the terms at any time, but they will notify the user in advance - typically via email or by posting proposed changes on their site. Your continued use of the service is taken as acceptance of the new or changed terms.
tosdr.case: user is notified a week or more in advance
